item.title: 土耳其反对党领袖酝酿新候选人挑战埃尔多安
item.description: 土耳其主要反对党提出，安卡拉市长有望成为其下一任总统候选人。【原文：Turkey’s main opposition party raised the prospect of the mayor of Ankara being its next presidential candidate, amid a clampdown that’s seen its most popular official and several others jailed.】

item.title: 股市反弹面临就业、通胀和美联储等障碍
item.description: 市场数据截至美国东部时间上午 05:46。根据供应商协议，市场数据可能会有所延迟。【原文：Market data as of 05:46 am EST. Market data may be delayed depending on provider agreements.】

item.title: 投资者为何对黄金爱不释手？
item.description: 几个世纪以来，黄金一直是政治和经济不稳定时期的避风港资产。黄金作为一种可靠的高价值商品，可以方便地运输并在任何地方出售，当其他一切都处于动荡之中时，黄金给人一种安全感。【原文：For centuries, gold has been the go-to haven asset in times of political and economic uncertainty. Its status as a reliably high-value commodity that can be transported easily and sold anywhere offers a sense of safety when everything else is in turmoil.】

item.title: 莫迪希望在印度本土生产芯片，ASML 为印度业务出谋划策
item.description: 随着印度总理纳伦德拉-莫迪（Narendra Modi）寻求在当地生产芯片并减少关键技术的进口，半导体设备制造商 ASML Holding NV 在印度开展业务。【原文：Semiconductor equipment maker ASML Holding NV made a pitch for business in India as Prime Minister Narendra Modi seeks to make chips locally and reduce imports of the critical technology.】

item.title: 宽幅震荡改善，股票多头在阴霾九月获得慰藉
item.description: 投资者对大小公司的信心都在增强，这为华尔街交易员在股市通常充满挑战的月份到来之前提供了重要的支撑。【原文：Investor confidence is growing in companies both big and small, providing a crucial pillar of support for Wall Street traders ahead of what’s typically been a challenging month for stocks.】

item.title: 新银行交易后，Natixis 所有者 BPCE 在里斯本加倍努力
item.description: 法国银行集团 BPCE 计划在里斯本开设第一家办事处，这标志着该集团在斥资 64 亿欧元（74 亿美元）收购 Novo Banco SA 后仅数月就在葡萄牙进行了重大扩张。【原文：French banking group BPCE plans to open its first office in Lisbon, marking a significant expansion in Portugal only months after it paid €6.4 billion ($7.4 billion) for Novo Banco SA.】

item.title: 瑞典警方逮捕 Fortnox 和 Tethys 内幕交易者
item.description: 瑞典当局发言人通过电话表示，瑞典有九人因涉嫌内幕交易而被捕，他们与在线会计公司 Fortnox AB 和能源公司 Tethys Oil AB 的收购要约有关。【原文：Nine people in Sweden have been arrested on charges of insider trading connected to the takeover offers for online accounting firm Fortnox AB and energy company Tethys Oil AB, a spokesperson for the authorities said by phone.】

item.title: 富兰克林邓普顿预计年底前金边债券收益率将升至 6% 以上
item.description: 富兰克林邓普顿公司（Franklin Templeton）称，随着投资者对英国财政前景的信心减弱，英国 30 年期债券的收益率将在今年年底攀升至 6% 以上。【原文：Yields on 30-year UK bonds will climb above 6% by the end of the year as investor confidence over the nation’s fiscal outlook falters, according to Franklin Templeton.】

item.title: 雀巢挑选内部人士接替因婚外情被解雇的首席执行官
item.description: 雀巢公司（Nestlé SA）在一年多一点的时间里第二次被解雇首席执行官，在此之后，雀巢公司正求助于管理其 Nespresso 咖啡帝国的高管，试图稳住这家全球最大的食品企业。【原文：Nestlé SA is turning to the executive who runs its Nespresso coffee empire to try and steady the world’s largest food business after it was rocked by the second CEO firing in a little over a year.】

item.title: 欧元区通胀加速超过 2%，支持欧洲央行暂停加息
item.description: 欧元区通胀加速，超过了欧洲中央银行的目标，巩固了官员们下周开会时将保持利率稳定的预期。【原文：Euro-area inflation accelerated beyond the European Central Bank’s target, cementing expectations that officials will keep interest rates steady when they meet next week.】

item.title: 特朗普削减太空研究是给中国的礼物
item.description:
美国天文学家说，如果没有更多的资金来支持望远镜的建造和研究工作，美国就有可能放弃这一领域。【原文：

American astronomers say that without more funding to support telescope construction and research operations, the US risks ceding the field.

】

item.title: Econostream 称欧洲央行辛库斯暗示 12 月降息
item.description: 据 Econostream Media 报道，理事会成员 Gediminas Simkus 暗示欧洲央行可能需要在 12 月降息。【原文：Governing Council member Gediminas Simkus suggested the European Central Bank may need to cut interest rates in December, according to Econostream Media.】

item.title: 石油价格下跌影响财政状况，沙特阿拉伯将出售更多美元债务
item.description: 沙特阿拉伯将出售更多的国际债券，以弥补因油价下跌和政府经济多元化活动的高支出而造成的预算赤字。【原文：Saudi Arabia is set to sell more international bonds, as it looks to cover a budget deficit caused by lower oil prices and high spending on the government’s economic-diversification drive.】

item.title: 隆巴欧迪收购股权管理公司 Ownership Capital
item.description: Banque Lombard Odier & Cie SA 收购了荷兰资产管理公司 Ownership Capital，这是日内瓦历史最悠久的金融机构进行的一次罕见收购。【原文：Banque Lombard Odier & Cie SA acquired Dutch asset manager Ownership Capital in a rare takeover by Geneva’s oldest financial institution.】

item.title: 食品巨头利用初创企业打开非洲巨大的非正规市场
item.description: 健力士尼日利亚公司和其他消费品巨头正转向初创企业，以开拓非洲庞大的非正规零售市场。【原文：Guinness Nigeria Plc and other consumer-goods giants are turning to startups to crack Africa’s vast informal retail market.】

item.title: Blackstone 计划与网购物流相关的英国 CMBS 交易
item.description: 据熟悉此事的人士透露，Blackstone Inc. 正计划出售高达 5 亿英镑（6.7 亿美元）的与英国仓库相关的债务。【原文：Blackstone Inc. is planning a debt sale of up to £500 million ($670 million) linked to UK warehouses, according to people familiar with the matter.】

item.title: 摩根士丹利的威尔逊称美股反弹还有待时日
item.description: 摩根士丹利（Morgan Stanley）的迈克尔-威尔逊（Michael Wilson）认为，由于美联储降息与企业盈利强劲同时发生，美国股市在经历四个月的上涨后将继续反弹。【原文：US stocks will continue rallying after four months of gains as Federal Reserve interest rate cuts coincide with robust corporate earnings, according to Morgan Stanley’s Michael Wilson.】

item.title: 高盛的梅尚称，尽管局势动荡，法国并购业仍将回暖
item.description: 高盛集团（Goldman Sachs Group Inc）巴黎联席主管 Celine-Marie Mechain 预计，尽管法国目前政局动荡，但该国的交易活动仍将加速。【原文：Goldman Sachs Group Inc Paris Co-Head Celine-Marie Mechain expects deal activity in France to accelerate despite the country’s current political turmoil.】

item.title: 捷克央行行长警告不要将利率维持在过低水平
item.description: 捷克央行行长 Ales Michl 表示，捷克央行降低利率是正确的，但决策者必须避免重蹈覆辙，长期将借贷成本维持在极低水平。【原文：The Czech central bank was right to bring interest rates lower but policymakers must avoid repeating the mistake of holding borrowing costs extremely low for a long period, according to Governor Ales Michl.】

item.title: 据称亿万富翁米塔尔将为 Airtel Money 2026 年的首次公开募股与花旗集团合作
item.description: 据熟悉内情的人士透露，亿万富翁苏尼尔-米塔尔（Sunil Mittal）的非洲电信公司（Airtel Africa Plc）已经为其移动支付部门的首次公开募股计划找到了花旗集团（Citigroup Inc.【原文：Billionaire Sunil Mittal’s Airtel Africa Plc has tapped Citigroup Inc. for a planned initial public offering of its mobile money unit, according to people familiar with the matter.】

item.title: 非洲最大杂货商拓展食品业务，提高利润率
item.description: 非洲最大的连锁超市 Shoprite Holdings Ltd. 加倍努力扩大其在本土市场的食品业务，并发展服装、婴儿用品、户外用品和宠物用品专卖店。【原文：Shoprite Holdings Ltd. doubled down on expanding its food business in its home market as well as growing specialist clothing, baby, outdoor and pet stores as Africa’s largest supermarket chain focuses on improve gross margins year-on-year.】

item.title: 英国 30 年期债券收益率攀升至 1998 年以来最高水平
item.description: 英国长期债券的收益率升至 1998 年以来的最高点，这进一步给首相基尔-斯塔默（Keir Starmer）的政府施加了压力，迫使其采取措施重拾市场信心。【原文：The yield on long-dated UK bonds rose to the highest since 1998, putting further pressure on Prime Minister Keir Starmer’s government to take steps to regain the confidence of markets.】

item.title: 沙特启动抵押担保市场以推动流动性
item.description: 沙特阿拉伯首次推出了住宅抵押贷款支持证券，此举旨在提高流动性，鼓励银行增加贷款，以推动王国的经济转型计划。【原文：Saudi Arabia has launched its first residential mortgage backed securities in a move designed to boost liquidity and encourage more bank lending to drive the kingdom’s economic transformation program.】

item.title: 铜接近本月最高点，金属因降息押注而上涨
item.description: 伦敦金属交易所的铜价接近五周高点，原因是美国降息预期为工业商品提供了支撑。【原文：Copper on the London Metal Exchange was trading near a five-week high as industrial commodities received support from US rate-cut expectations.】

item.title: 印度银行告知印度央行购买国家债券的空间有限
item.description: 熟悉内情的人士说，印度一些最大的银行已经告诉央行，它们已经没有余力购买各邦发行的债券了。【原文：Some of India’s biggest banks have told the central bank that they are running out of room to buy bonds issued by states, people familiar with the matter said.】

item.title: 瑞士在线市场公司 SMG 宣布首次公开募股计划
item.description: SMG Swiss Marketplace Group AG 宣布了在瑞士证券交易所上市的计划，这将是瑞士一年多来首次实质性发行股票。【原文：SMG Swiss Marketplace Group AG announced plans to list on the SIX Swiss Exchange, which would mark Switzerland’s first substantial offering in more than a year.】

item.title: 施纳贝尔告诉路透社：欧洲央行应保持利率稳定
item.description: 欧洲中央银行执行董事会成员伊莎贝尔-施纳贝尔（Isabel Schnabel）对路透社表示，在通胀风险上行的情况下，欧洲中央银行应将借贷成本维持在当前水平。【原文：The European Central Bank should maintain borrowing costs at current levels with inflation risks tilted to the upside, Executive Board member Isabel Schnabel told Reuters.】

item.title: 欧洲央行科切尔主张在下一次决策前保持谨慎
item.description: 奥地利新任欧洲中央银行理事会成员马丁-科切尔（Martin Kocher）主张在下一次利率决策前采取谨慎态度。【原文：Austria’s new European Central Bank Governing Council member Martin Kocher advocated for a cautious approach heading into the next decision over interest rates.】

item.title: 富时 100 指数直播：英国股市将跑赢疲软的欧洲股市
香港融资成本在股市波动中创下 5 月以来最大降幅
item.description: 由于本地股市回落抑制了短期资金需求，香港隔夜利率创下 5 月份以来最大降幅。【原文：Hong Kong’s overnight interest rate slid by the most since May as a pullback in local stocks dampened demand for short-term funding.】
